description: Provides a Datadog - Google Cloud Platform integration resource. This can be used to create and manage Datadog - Google Cloud Platform integration.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

ClientEmail.description: Your email found in your JSON service account key.

ClientId.description: Your ID found in your JSON service account key.

HostFilters.description: Limit the GCE instances that are pulled into Datadog by using tags. Only hosts that match one of the defined tags are imported into Datadog.

PrivateKey.description: Your private key name found in your JSON service account key.

PrivateKeyId.description: Your private key ID found in your JSON service account key.

ProjectId.description: Your Google Cloud project ID found in your JSON service account key.
